[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1575619555297{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 320px !important;background-color: #231834 !important;}” el_class=”shape1″][vc_row css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1575619562814{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;border-bottom-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.05) !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Stop worrying about IT problems” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”none”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]Are you concerned that your business is being stifled by your obsolete technology? Are you feeling like your growth and productivity has plateaued? Are you at the mercy of a total system failure without a cloud back-up plan in place?[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1575619570817{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;border-bottom-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.05) !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Focus on your business” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”none”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]Deploying a NanoSoft computer network solution to address what ails your business technology can get you back your competitive advantage and help you grow your business again.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1575619591604{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”We take care of your technology” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”none”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]Perhaps it’s time to call in the pros. We’ll whip your IT into shape and set you up with regularly schedule onsite support visits – and we won’t charge any hidden fees to do it. Schedule a FREE consultation today.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1575619826323{margin-top: -300px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 100px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1575619839884{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;background: #ffffff url(https://live.21lab.co/nanosoft/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/content-bottom-bg.jpg?id=538) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: contain !important;}” el_class=”bg-bottom”][vc_custom_heading text=”Why choose us?” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26px|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]At NanoSoft Technology Solutions, we leverage IT security and automation to help you:[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1537608626309{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”][vc_column_inner]

  • Protect your business

    Reduce risk by preventing (or recovering from) security breaches.

  • Optimize IT systems

    Improve efficiencies, drive cost out of processes.

  • Empower your employees

    Allow your employees to do more and go further.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1537583880565{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575619607108{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Technology and Partners” font_container=”tag:h6|font_size:10px|text_align:center|color:%23627792″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”style1″][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Helping businesses around the world” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Businesses today cross borders and regions, so you need a service provider that goes where you are. With a large network of U.S and globally based locations and service centers we have the infrastructure to provide the services you need, when and where you need them.” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:17px|text_align:center|line_height:1.65em” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″ content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”none”][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1408″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1409″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1410″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1411″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1412″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1413″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575619632372{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/6″][vc_column_text]

    Being back with NanoSoft just gives me peace of mind knowing that my technology is functioning seamlessly behind the scenes without it interfering with and disrupting our day-to-day operations.

    Jeffrey
    Brooklyn, NY

    One of the things I like best about your company, is that there is “no box” when it comes to solving problems. NanoSoft has a more diverse way of looking at things and finding creative ways to address our needs.

    Richard
    New York, NY

    Very late in the day, I received a request from our director to obtain a quote for software and laptops. We needed them by noon the next day. But John Doe was able to get those to us first thing in the morning.

    St. Flynn
    London, UK
